faq.title: Preguntas frecuentes
faq.a1: ¡Sí! El plan gratuito te permite crear hasta 5 CVs, 1 carta de presentación, usar 5 créditos IA/mes y exportar hasta 2 documentos/mes en PDF — sin tarjeta de crédito. Actualiza a Pro para 10 CVs, 20 cartas de presentación, 100 créditos IA, exportaciones ilimitadas y formato DOCX.
faq.a2: Todos los planes admiten exportación en PDF. Los planes Pro y Enterprise también desbloquean el formato DOCX (Microsoft Word). El plan gratuito incluye 2 exportaciones/mes; Pro y Enterprise ofrecen exportaciones ilimitadas. La exportación TXT no está disponible actualmente.
faq.a3: Nuestra IA analiza tu experiencia y la descripción del puesto para generar contenido personalizado. Utiliza modelos de lenguaje avanzados para crear textos profesionales e impactantes.
faq.a4: Sí. Todos los datos se cifran en tránsito (TLS) y en reposo (AES-256). Cumplimos con el RGPD, no vendemos tus datos a terceros y puedes solicitar la eliminación completa de tu cuenta en cualquier momento desde la configuración de tu cuenta.
faq.q5: ¿Puedo cancelar mi suscripción en cualquier momento?
faq.a5: Sí, puedes cancelar en cualquier momento desde la configuración de facturación — sin preguntas. Tu suscripción permanece activa hasta el final del período de facturación actual y no se te cobrará nuevamente.
faq.a6: FlacronCV actualmente admite inglés, español, francés, alemán, árabe y urdu — tanto para la interfaz de la aplicación como para el contenido de tu CV. Próximamente más idiomas (incluidos portugués, italiano y chino).

about.title: About FlacronCV
about.subtitle: Empowering professionals worldwide to build careers they love
about.hero_title: We believe everyone deserves a great CV
about.hero_desc: FlacronCV was founded with one mission: to give every professional — regardless of design skills or budget — the tools they need to stand out and land their dream job.
about.mission_desc: To democratize access to professional career tools through the power of artificial intelligence, helping 10,000+ professionals worldwide create CVs that get noticed.
about.story_desc: Founded in 2024, FlacronCV started as a simple idea: what if creating a professional CV was as easy as filling in a form? Today, we serve professionals across 6 languages and 50+ countries, with AI-powered tools that make the job search faster and smarter.
about.value1_desc: We strip away complexity so you can focus on what matters — your career, not the software.
about.value2_desc: Every template and AI feature is crafted to professional standards, tested by real HR experts.
about.value3_desc: Professional career tools should be available to everyone, everywhere — regardless of budget.
about.value4_desc: Your career data is yours. We are GDPR compliant and never sell your personal information.
about.team_desc: Our team of engineers, designers, and career coaches works every day to make FlacronCV the best CV builder in the world.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how FlacronCV ('we', 'us', or 'our') collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our service.
privacy.s1_account: Account Information: When you register, we collect your name, email address, and password (hashed).
privacy.s1_content: CV Content: The CV and cover letter data you enter is stored securely and associated with your account.
privacy.s1_usage: Usage Data: We collect anonymous usage analytics (pages visited, features used) to improve our service.
privacy.s1_cookies: Cookies: We use cookies for authentication, preferences, and analytics. See our Cookie Policy for details.
privacy.s2_provide: To provide and maintain our service
privacy.s2_improve: To improve and personalize your experience
privacy.s2_communicate: To send important service updates and notifications
privacy.s2_security: To detect and prevent fraud and security issues
privacy.s3_desc: We do not sell your personal data to third parties. We may share data with trusted service providers (Firebase, Stripe) solely to operate our service, bound by strict confidentiality agreements.
privacy.s4_desc: We protect your data using TLS encryption in transit and AES-256 encryption at rest. Access to your data is strictly controlled and audited.
privacy.s5_access: Right to Access: Request a copy of your personal data.
privacy.s5_correct: Right to Rectification: Correct inaccurate personal data.
privacy.s5_delete: Right to Erasure: Request deletion of your account and all associated data.
privacy.s5_portability: Right to Portability: Export your data in a machine-readable format.
privacy.s5_contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@flacroncv.com
privacy.s6_desc: We retain your data as long as your account is active. If you delete your account, all associated data is permanently deleted within 30 days.
privacy.s7_desc: For privacy-related questions, contact our Data Protection Officer at privacy@flacroncv.com

cookies_policy.title: Cookie Policy
cookies_policy.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how FlacronCV uses cookies and similar tracking technologies when you visit our website.
cookies_policy.s1_desc: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us recognize you, remember your preferences, and improve your experience.
cookies_policy.s2_essential_desc: These cookies are necessary for the website to function. They enable core features like authentication and security. You cannot opt out of essential cookies.
cookies_policy.s2_essential_examples: Examples: session token, authentication state, CSRF protection
cookies_policy.s2_preference_desc: These cookies remember your settings and preferences to provide a personalized experience.
cookies_policy.s2_preference_examples: Examples: language selection, dark/light mode, sidebar state
cookies_policy.s2_analytics_desc: We use analytics to understand how visitors use our site so we can improve it. All analytics data is anonymized.
cookies_policy.s2_analytics_examples: Examples: pages visited, time on page, feature usage
cookies_policy.s3_desc: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling essential cookies will affect website functionality. Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies in their privacy settings.
cookies_policy.s4_desc: We use trusted third-party services that may set their own cookies: Firebase (authentication), Stripe (payments), and analytics providers. These are governed by their respective privacy policies.
cookies_policy.s5_desc: We may update this Cookie Policy occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes via email or a notice on our website.
cookies_policy.s6_desc: For questions about our use of cookies, contact us at privacy@flacroncv.com
